physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the General Hospital in Rangoon
 Burma. The hospital building is a long building
 with three extended sections. There is a tower behind the hospital in the background of the photograph. There is a horse-drawn carriage in front of the hospital. The photograph is folded at the top right and left corners. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the General Hospital in Rangoon, Burma. The hospital building is a long building, with three extended sections. There is a tower behind the hospital in the background of the photograph. There is a horse-drawn carriage in front of the hospital. The photograph is folded at the top right and left corners. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
